name: FetchZoomBillingInvoices
description:
Retrieve billing invoices reports for a specific billing period.

Use this tool to obtain department billing invoices reports from Zoom for a specified billing period. Ensure you have the necessary permissions and billing ID. Suitable for accounts with Pro or higher plans that have enabled Department Billing.

parameters.name: billing_report_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the billing report. Acquire this ID from the response of the Get Billing Reports API.

value_schema.description: The billing report's unique identifier. Retrieve this ID from the response of **Get Billing Reports** API request.
